post.title: panasonic tv query
post.content: hi all, i've currently got a year old : panasonic txp50s20b which i am very happy with, but after seeing my daughters : panasonic txl32dt30b i now fancy 3d!!! i've been looking at this on jl's website which is priced less than my current tv cost me: tx-p50st30 can anyone please tell me if this is a better set than my current one (exception of 3d and smart features of course!). my major concern in pq through sky primarily. many thanks in advance
